snippet: Michael Swier’s new Los Angeles music club, the Teragram Ballroom, is a big leap for a businessman who made a name for himself in New York.
abstract: Michael Swier, who opened rock clubs the Mercury Lounge and the Bowery Ballroom in New York City in the 1990s, is set to open Teragram Ballroom in Los Angeles; venture, which involved $2 million renovation of former silent movie theater, is Swier's first West Coast project.
lead_paragraph: Michael Swier’s new Los Angeles music club, the Teragram Ballroom, is a big leap for a businessman who made a name for himself in New York.

headline.seo: Bowery Ballroom Leader Plans Music Club in Los Angeles
headline.main: A Bowery Titan Puts Down L.A. Roots
headline.print_headline: A Bowery Titan Puts Down L.A. Roots
